  • java.lang.Object

    DBSyncAgent

    public static class DBSyncAgent.Builder
extends java.lang.Object

    Builder Pattern

      • setServerDatabaseConnectionOptions

        public DBSyncAgent.Builder setServerDatabaseConnectionOptions(java.lang.String serverDatabaseConnectionOptions)
        Set the optional connection string to be used for the server connection. All options in the MySQL connection string as per the Connector/J appear here. e.g. "?useSSL=false"
        Parameters:
        serverDatabaseConnectionOptions - optional connection string
        Returns:
        Builder object as per the Builder pattern

      • setSyncInterval

        public DBSyncAgent.Builder setSyncInterval(int syncInterval)
        Set the synchronization interval. This specifies the time interval between two successive synchronization attempts during a live sync. Specified in seconds.
        Parameters:
        syncInterval - synchronization interval in seconds
        Returns:
        Builder object as per the Builder pattern

      • build

        public DBSyncAgent build()
        Build the DBSyncAgent object using the Builder pattern after all properties have been set using the Builder class.
        Returns:
        a new DBSyncAgent object with all properties set
